TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVersioningPersonalizable

summary.span: 表示一个接口，该接口能够管理属于以前版本的 Web 部件控件的个性化数据。

span.span: Represents an interface that can manage personalization data belonging to a previous version of a Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Web 部件控件升级到较新版本时，可能对升级后的类可个性化属性的更改。When you upgrade a Web Parts control to a newer version, there might be changes to the personalizable properties on the upgraded class. 例如，Web 部件控件的升级的版本可能不再支持早期版本中提供的属性。For example, an upgraded version of a Web Parts control might no longer support properties that were available in previous versions. 在此类方案中，Web 部件控件集可能会从基础数据存储区加载个性化设置数据，但没有针对所应用于此数据的属性。In such a scenario, the Web Parts control set might load personalization data from the underlying data store, but have no properties against which to apply this data. 如果某个控件实现接口，Web 部件控件传递孤立的个性化设置数据。If a control implements the interface, the Web Parts control is passed the orphaned personalization data. 然后，应用程序可以使用此数据来更新属性中的较新版本，或以某种其他方式使用的数据。The application can then use this data to update properties in the newer version, or use the data in some other manner. 请注意，如果检测到孤立的属性，导入 Web 部件控件时也会调用方法。Note that if orphaned properties are detected when importing Web Parts controls, the method is also called.

related.span: Web 部件个性化设置概述
演练： 实现使用用户控件的 Web 部件个性化设置

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load(class System.Collections.IDictionary unknownProperties) cil managed

param.name: unknownProperties
param.span: 一个无法应用于控件的个性化数据字典。

span.span: A dictionary of personalization data that could not be applied to a control.

summary.span: 将个性化数据加载到一个 Web 部件控件，该控件由于版本更改而没有相应的数据个性化属性。

span.span: Loads personalization data to a Web Parts control that does not have a corresponding personalized property for the data due to a version change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unknownProperties`参数包含未知的个性化设置数据，无法应用到控件的"用户"和"共享"作用域的合并表示形式。The `unknownProperties` parameter contains a merged representation of unknown personalization data, of both "User" and "Shared" scope, that could not be applied to the control. 当用户作用域中运行页面时，未知的用户作用域提供值 （如果可用） 而不是未知的共享范围值。When a page is running in user scope, the unknown user-scope values are supplied (if available) rather than unknown shared-scope values. 此信息存储为一系列的名称/值对其中每个名称是在控件未找到的属性的字符串名称，每个值包含属性值。This information is stored as a series of name/value pairs where each name is the string name of a property that was not found on the control and each value contains the property value. 它负责要强制转换或将值转换为适当的类型和执行进一步的处理 （如将数据从旧的属性为新属性的映射） 的控件。It is the responsibility of the control to cast or convert the value to the appropriate type and carry out further processing (such as mapping data from an old property to a new property). 如果控件的状态发生更改，则应调用(继承的方法或在不是派生的控件的情况下的公共静态方法)。If a control's state changes, it should call (either the inherited method, or the public static method in the case of a control that does not derive from ). 如果控件将自身标记为"脏"，Web 部件控件集将从该控件，而不考虑控件的"更新"状态，提取个性化设置数据，并将其返回到基础数据存储区保存个性化设置生命周期中更高版本。If a control marks itself as "dirty", the Web Parts control set will extract personalization data from the control, regardless of the control's "dirty" state, and save it back to the underlying data store later in the personalization life cycle. 控件应将自身标记为"脏"if、 处理中的值后`unknownProperties`参数，该控件的状态已发生更改。A control should mark itself as "dirty" if, as a result of processing the values in the `unknownProperties` parameter, the control's state has changed. 请注意，是否检测到孤立的属性的导入 Web 部件控件时，此方法自动调用。Note that if orphaned properties are detected when importing Web Parts controls, this method is automatically called.
